eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.text

Class HCPStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.text.HCPStyle

  • public class HCPStyle
extends Object
    A style for text consisting of the font, size and color to use when painting the text.

    This class is immutable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HCPStyle(PDFont font, float size)
      Constructs a style with black color and the specified font and size.
      HCPStyle(PDFont font, float size, Color color)
      Constructs a style with the specified font, size and color.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(PDPageContentStream content)
      Configures the specified PDPageContentStream so that any subsequent text operations will be performed using the font, size and color defined by this style.
      float getAscent()
      Calculates the ascent of this style in default user space units.
      Color getColor()
      Returns the color of this style.
      float getDescent()
      Calculates the descent of this style in default user space units.
      PDFont getFont()
      Returns the font of this style.
      float getHeight()
      Calculates the height of this style in default user space units.
      float getSize()
      Returns the size of this style.
      float getStringWidth(String text)
      Calculates the width of the specified text in default user space units.
      HCPStyle withColor(Color color)
      Returns an HCPStyle with the specified color.
      HCPStyle withFont(PDFont font)
      Returns an HCPStyle with the specified font.
      HCPStyle withSize(float size)
      Returns an HCPStyle with the specified size.

      • HCPStyle

        public HCPStyle(PDFont font,
                float size)
        Constructs a style with black color and the specified font and size.
        Parameters:
        font - not null
        size - must be >= 1
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if font is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if size < 1

      • HCPStyle

        public HCPStyle(PDFont font,
                float size,
                Color color)
        Constructs a style with the specified font, size and color.
        Parameters:
        font - not null
        size - must be >= 1
        color - not null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if font or color is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if size < 1

      • withFont

        public HCPStyle withFont(PDFont font)
        Returns an HCPStyle with the specified font.

        If the font returned by getFont() is specified, this method simply returns this.

        Parameters:
        font - not null
        Returns:
        a new HCPStyle with the specified font
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if font is null

      • withSize

        public HCPStyle withSize(float size)
        Returns an HCPStyle with the specified size.

        If the size returned by getSize() is specified, this method simply returns this.

        Parameters:
        size - must be >= 1
        Returns:
        a new HCPStyle with the specified size
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if size < 1

      • withColor

        public HCPStyle withColor(Color color)
        Returns an HCPStyle with the specified color.

        If the color returned by getColor() is specified, this method simply returns this.

        Parameters:
        color - not null
        Returns:
        an HCPStyle with the specified color
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if color is null

      • apply

        public void apply(PDPageContentStream content)
           throws IOException
        Configures the specified PDPageContentStream so that any subsequent text operations will be performed using the font, size and color defined by this style.
        Parameters:
        content - the stream to set up; not null
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO error occurs while writing to the stream

      • getAscent

        public float getAscent()
        Calculates the ascent of this style in default user space units.
        Returns:
        the ascent in default user space units
        See Also:
        Default User Space

      • getDescent

        Calculates the descent of this style in default user space units.

      • getStringWidth

        public float getStringWidth(String text)
                     throws IOException
        Calculates the width of the specified text in default user space units.
        Parameters:
        text - not null
        Returns:
        the width in default user space units
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if text is null
        IOException - if there is an error getting the width information
        See Also:
        Default User Space

      • getHeight

        public float getHeight()
                throws IOException
        Calculates the height of this style in default user space units.

        Throws:
